title: A Hollywood Christmas at Farmers & Fletchers In the City
text:
A Hollywood Christmas at Farmers & Fletchers In the City A Hollywood Christmas at Farmers & Fletchers In the City Details Category: 2015 Christmas Venues & Packages near you! Created on Friday, 24 July 2015 10:30 Farmers & Fletchers In the City is an elegant new events space opening at 3 Cloth Street in September. Farmers & Fletchers In the City will incorporate a contemporary feel with a nod to the traditions of the Livery Halls, yet with a clean and modern look. Natural colours such as soft duck egg, soft sage green and soft pebble grey have been used throughout, making it an elegant and versatile venue. 
To celebrate their first Christmas, three special festive packages have been created - each with a glamorous Hollywood theme. The venue is equally suitable for intimate festive gatherings as it is for larger Christmas parties. The venue can accommodate up to 120 for a seated dinner in the Great Hall or 200 over two floors for a buffet. On arrival guests will cruise the red carpet being snapped by the paparazzi. Guests can enjoy a drinks reception before they make their way down the grand circular staircase and arrive in true Hollywood style. The venue will be tastefully decorated Hollywood style and each table will be beautifully set with festive decoration, Hollywood memorabilia and crackers. There will be Hollywood classics playing on screen and after dinner there will also be a great DJ that is sure to get the party started. Farmers & Fletchers In the City will continue to demonstrate their passion for food provenance by supporting British Farming and British suppliers, by creating British sourced menus for the Christmas season. With free range and corn-fed turkeys from farms in Norfolk , fish from British shores and most of the vegetables from two suppliers based in Kent: one of whom is a unique farm co-operative working with a number of specialist farmers from across the Market Garden of England. ￼ All surplus profits from events at the venue will go to charity. All Christmas packages are for a minimum of 80 guests and include: Hollywood themed venue with beautifully dressed Christmas tree Exclusive use of Farmers & Fletchers in the City from 18.00 until 23.30.
